entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Ref safety errors reported for deconstruction assignment with discard #65522
  • List pattern indexable requirement binds to this[object] indexer #65521
  • Compiler treats `string?` as `string` #65520
  • Document outline not showing all members vb #65519
  • `Inline temporary variable` adds unnecessary cast and introduces warning #65517
  • CS0452 and CS0718 error sometimes reported on unintuitive locations #65515

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove cast of string literal to string #65518
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Cleanup `SyntaxNormalizerTests` #65516
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Update to latest version of protocol with new pull diagnostic types #65514
    Area-IDE
  • Fix MEF composition used for the LSIF generator #65512
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #65513
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Do not import the VSWorkspace during Roslyn package initialization #65492
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5 to main #65510
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5 to release/dev17.5-vs-deps #65511
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Split out ref safety analysis into a separate pass after binding #64928
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to features/lambda-default-parameters #65524
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #65523
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Parser semicolon in initializer expression error handling #65256
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Move IDS_FeatureXXX checks out of the parser #65500
    Area-Compilers
  • Add experimental formatting option to control placement of `=>` #65476
    Area-IDE
  • Improve consistency in our parser code. #65508
    Area-Compilers
  • Ensure lvalue struct receivers are not copied by value due to interpolated string handler rewrite #65505
    Area-Compilers
